briefTitle: Efficacy of Alogliptin and With Pioglitazone in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes.
officialTitle: Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel-Group Study Comparing SYR-322 Alone and Combination SYR-322 With Pioglitazone Versus Placebo on Postprandial Lipids in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes

arms.label: Alogliptin 25 mg QD + Pioglitazone 30 mg QD

summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the efficacy of Alogliptin, once daily (QD), taken by itself and with pioglitazone on postprandial lipid measures in type 2 diabetes.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Postprandial Incremental Area Under the Curve for Total Triglycerides at Week 16.

effectByArm.arm: Alogliptin 25 mg QD + Pioglitazone 30 mg QD
